channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Palantir boss Alex Karp hires people in less than 2 minutes and personally interviews applicants
item.description: When hiring, Palantir CEO Alex Karp wants to "feel like I’m in the presence of talent.”

item.title: AMD to acquire server builder ZT Systems for $4.9 billion in cash and stock
item.description: Advanced Micro Devices on Monday said it plans to acquire server maker ZT Systems for $4.9 billion as the company seeks to expand its portfolio of artificial intelligence chips and hardware and battle Nvidia.

item.title: AMD strikes another AI deal, to buy ZT Systems for $4.9 billion
The era of ‘invented in California, made in China’ is over, warns Singapore’s prime minister
item.description: Beijing is “convinced that America is seeking to contain it and suppress its rise,” PM Lawrence Wong argued on Sunday.

item.title: Monday analyst calls: Even more upside ahead for Nvidia, tough outlook for HP
item.description: This is CNBC Pro's live coverage of Monday's analyst calls and Wall Street chatter.

item.title: Bank of America finds near-record 'financialization' of U.S. economy
Why high food prices can be good news for shoppers—the Swiss farming paradox explained
item.description: The result is that crops such as cherry tomatoes are usually cheaper when they’re out of season.

item.title: Canada-wide freight rail stoppage looms this week as two firms issue lockout notices
item.description: Failing last-minute deals, both Canadian National Railway and Canadian Pacific Kansas City plan to lock out workers from the early hours of Thursday.

item.title: 7-Eleven owner confirms Canadian takeover bid after stock-price surge
Dortmund reports highest revenue in club history—just a few months after the sale of English midfielder Jude Bellingham
item.description: Bundesliga side Borussia Dortmund generated 509.1 million euros ($559 million) last season.

item.title: Russia struggles to respond to Ukraine's incursion as forces destroy key bridges and war potential
item.description: Ukrainian forces say they've blown up a second strategically-significant bridge in Russia's Kursk region, as Kyiv continues its incursion.

item.title: European defense stocks hit by report on future German aid to Ukraine
DeSantis strategist who pushed for the disastrous Twitter campaign launch is now working with Elon Musk to help elect Donald Trump
item.description: Generra Peck and Elon Musk are working together again on a super political action committee, America PAC, dedicated to electing Donald Trump.

item.title: Beijing and Hollywood are decoupling as Chinese audiences favor domestic productions
item.description: After years of strong showings in China's box office, Hollywood films are being pushed out by homegrown blockbusters in the massive movie market.

item.title: Recession obsession: Why some people root for an economic downturn
